title: ExxonMobil lands promising pair of exploration blocks in North Africa
Content: ExxonMobil lands promising pair of exploration blocks in North Africa | Upstream Exploration ExxonMobil lands promising pair of exploration blocks in North Africa US supermajor wants to assess oil and gas potential of shallow water acreage offshore MoroccoMorocco's King Mohammed VI.Photo: MOROCCAN AGENCY PRESS/AFP/SCANPIX Iain Esau Africa CorrespondentLondon ExxonMobilMoroccoONHYMAfricaNorth Africa Published 3 July 2024, 09:26Updated 3 July 2024, 09:26
